articles.author: STEVE DOUGLAS
articles.title: Spain beats England 2-1 to win record fourth European Championship title - The Associated Press
articles.description: Spain has won a record fourth European Championship title after Mikel Oyarzabal’s 86th-minute goal clinched a 2-1 victory as England's painful decades-long wait for a major trophy goes on. Oyarzabal slid in to poke home Marc Cucurella’s cross just when the ga…
articles.content:
BERLIN (AP) Spain is the king of European soccer for a record fourth time. For England, its another agonizing near-miss in the teams decades-long tale of underachievement.
Completing a tournament th… [+5479 chars]
